title: Paulo Coelho: The Complete Collection
description: Includes:The Pilgrimage (1987)The Alchemist (1988)Brida (1990)The Valkyries (1992)By the River Piedra I Sat Down and Wept (1994)The Fifth Mountain (1996)Veronika Decides to Die (1998)The Devil and Miss Prym (2000)Eleven Minutes (2003)The Zahir (2005)Witch to Portobello (2002)The Winner Stands Alone (2008)
author: Paulo Coelho
